Package explorer

This is the main package.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ColumnListener Interface to define column listeners
Status Interface for status bar
 

Class Summary
About class called to show/hide the "about" window
AdminMain Class for the administrator view of the device tree program
AttributePanel The AttributePanel is a panel that contains the attribute table and the the viewers for all images that are not of type scalar.
AttributeTable AttributeTable implements the table holding the attributes.
AttributeTableModel Implements parts of the table model needed by AttributeTable
BooleanViewer A JCheckBox compatible viewer that looks like a double LED.
CommandTable Class representing all things specific to the command table.
CommandTableModel CommandTableModel implements parts of the table model needed by CommandTable
DeviceAliasDialog Class for the "device alias" panel
DeviceList A class to manage a list of devices to refresh
EntityAliasDialog Class for the "entity (attribute/command) alias" panel
EntityTable EntityTable represents all things common to the attribute and command table.
EntityTableModel EntityTableModel implements parts of the table model needed by EntityTable
FileManager Class that manages all interactions with files (load/save, errors, etc...)
Main Schema for the main class.
Preferences A class to manage preferences for device tree application.
SetDialog Class that manages the "set" dialog box for an attribute
ViewDialog The panel that manages the preferences like the visible fields in table
ViewerMain Main class for device tree application in "user" mode
 

Exception Summary
DeviceTreeFileException A class to manage problems with file reading
 

Package explorer Description

This is the main package. You will find here the core of the Device Tree application.

See Device Tree Manual for more informations.
